title: Identifying and Developing Design Expert Competencies: Application in the Mathematics Domain

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: BYOD-based course where teams analyze and develop expert competencies in mathematical problem-solving processes, with personalized feedback following learner competency diagnostics

learning_goals: Accurately identify expert-level judgment criteria in mathematical design problem-solving processes with over 80% accuracy
Analyze strengths and weaknesses in personal and peer design expertise using a competency assessment model at least three times
Apply and validate at least two expert-level problem-solving approaches through project deliverables
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
